content: Select one of the suggested modes, or use Custom to configure all the parameters manually.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message that explains how to select an embedding mode for the SDK. It appears as part of a user interface element that prompts users to choose between suggested modes or manually configure parameters. The purpose is to provide context and clarity for users making settings choices.

usage.context:
</CategoryDescription>
 <CategoryHeader>
 {t("SelectModeEmbedding", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </CategoryHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" color={theme.sdkPresets.secondaryColor}>
 {t("InitializeSDK")}
 </Text>
 <PresetsContainer className={`${isFlex ? "presets-flex" : ""}`}>
 {presetsData.map((data) => (
 <PresetTile
 t={t}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لتشكيل جميع الإعدادات" (to shape all settings) is not the most natural way to express 'to configure all the parameters'. A more accurate translation would use a verb implying configuration or adjustment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حدد أحد الأوضاع المقترحة أو استخدم مخصص لتهيئة جميع الإعدادات يدويا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'مخصص' could benefit from a definite article ('الـ') to align with standard Arabic usage when referring to a specific customization option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حدد أحد الأوضاع المقترحة أو استخدم المخصص لتشكيل جميع الإعدادات يدويا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Fərdi' is a literal translation of 'Custom' and might not be the most natural phrasing in Azerbaijani. It feels a bit robotic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more idiomatic expression for 'Custom', such as 'Xüsusi' or 'Özəl' depending on the specific nuance desired. For example: 'Tövsiyə olunan rejimlərdən birini seçin və ya bütün parametrləri əl ilə konfiqurasiya etmək üçün Xüsusi seçin.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "μη αυτόματα" (mi aftomata) translates to "non-automatically" which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "manually".  It's unnecessarily complex and awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Επιλέξτε έναν από τους προτεινόμενους τρόπους λειτουργίας ή χρησιμοποιήστε το «Προσαρμοσμένη» για να ρυθμίσετε όλες τις παραμέτρους με μη αυτόματο τρόπο.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The quotation marks around "Προσαρμοσμένη" are a different style than the English quotation marks.  Consistency is important.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Επιλέξτε έναν από τους προτεινόμενους τρόπους λειτουργίας ή χρησιμοποιήστε το «Προσαρμοσμένη» για να ρυθμίσετε όλες τις παραμέτρους με μη αυτόματο τρόπο.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Select one of the suggested modes' is not perfectly conveyed by 'Choisissez l'une des suggestions de mode.' It implies a list of modes is being presented for selection, while the English suggests a mode selection based on pre-defined options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Choisissez l'un des modes proposés ou utilisez le mode Personnalisé afin de configurer manuellement tous les paramètres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Personnalisé' is a valid word, it might be better to use 'Personnalisation' in this context to better align with the English 'Custom'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Choisissez l'un des modes proposés ou utilisez le mode Personnalisation afin de configurer manuellement tous les paramètres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '맞춤화를 이용하여' (using customization) is a bit awkward in this context. It suggests an action on the customization itself rather than using a custom configuration option. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning of 'Custom'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 제안된 모드 중 하나를 선택하거나, Custom 모드를 선택하여 모든 매개변수를 수동으로 구성하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Custom' is translated as 'Pielāgots'. While technically correct, a more natural and common translation for 'Custom' in this context (referring to a configuration option) would be 'Manuāli'. 'Pielāgots' implies a customized product, not a setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmantojiet Manuāli, lai manuāli konfigurētu visus parametrus.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Custom" as "Niestandardowe" is technically correct but can be improved for clarity and naturalness in this context. "Custom" often translates more smoothly as "Własny" or "Zaawansowany" when referring to configuration options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wybierz jeden z sugerowanych trybów lub użyj opcji Własny, aby ręcznie skonfigurować wszystkie parametry.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Particularizat' doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Custom' in this context. 'Personalizat' would be a more accurate translation, referring to a custom or personalized configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selectați unul dintre modurile sugerate sau utilizați modul Personalizat pentru a configura manual toți parametrii.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අභිරුචි තෝරන්න' doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Custom'. While 'අභිරුචි' relates to customization, it's more about personalized preferences. 'Custom' here means manual configuration of all settings. A more accurate translation might involve terms related to manual setup or configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'අත්පත්ති කළමණාකරණය' (manual management) or 'අත්පොත් සැකසුම්' (manual settings) depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'සියලුම පරාමිති අතින් වින්‍යාසයට' is slightly awkward. It could be improved for better flow in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring to 'සියලුම පරාමිති අත්පොතින් සැකසීමට' or 'සියලුම පරාමිති අතින්ම සැකසීමට'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an issue, the combination of Sinhala and Romanized Sinhala (vin‍යාසයට) can look unprofessional. Ideally, consistently use either full Sinhala script or Romanized script.  For this context, full Sinhala is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'වින්‍යාසයට' with 'සැකසුමට' or a similar full Sinhala word.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Vlastný' (Custom) is correctly spelled, but the capitalization is inconsistent.  'Vlastný' should likely be lowercase 'vlastný' to match the typical capitalization of options in user interfaces.

The phrase 'Select one of the suggested modes' is not accurately reflected in the Slovenian translation. 'Izberite enega od predlaganih načinov' literally translates to 'Choose one of the proposed methods/ways', which is a slightly different nuance than 'Select'. While understandable, 'Select' implies a choice from a presented option, whereas 'Choose' is a more general action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Razmislite o uporabi 'Izberite' za bolj natančno ujemanje s pomenom 'Select'.
